page.title: 10 Duston Swimming Pool
page.content:
This is at the Community Centre. It was finished in 1972 at a cost of 90,000 pounds, the money being provided by the Nene Foundation. The pool is 25 metres by 10 metres, graduating from 1 metre to 3 metres in depth. It holds 100,000 gallons of water and is rarely completely emptied. The water is pemanently filtered and is heated to 78 degrees F. Every two months the pool is given a backwash' with some water taken out whilst fresh is added.
The pool, used by schools and clubs, is open until 10.00 p.m. It is open to the general public during school holiday.
